Author: ComputerGenie ğŸ‘´ğŸ¼ğŸ“¢#7004
Content: The fork happens when your local node decides that the contract UTXo belongs to your bet and not someone else's; therefore a block containing that UTXO spent by someone else is "invalid" to your node (because your node read the mempool and saw it non in use)
